si.title: දැවැන්ත වංචාව පිළිබඳ අනතුරු ඇඟවීම
body_lines: ශ්රී ලංකාවේ විදේශ රැකියා කාර්යාංශය. රීල්

en.title: Alert on massive fraud
body_lines: Sri Lanka's Foreign Employment Bureau. Remble

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the alert in 200 characters:
Massive fraud detected at Sri Lanka's Foreign Employment Bureau. "Remble" likely refers to a specific case or individual involved in the fraud scheme.
